alert.note: Alert for Columbiana (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 12:12AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio, including the following county, Columbiana. Portions of Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Allegheny, Beaver and Butler. * WHEN...Until 315 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1212 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ross Township, McCandless Township, Cranberry, Franklin Park, Aliquippa, Monaca, Shaler Township, Plum, Hampton Township, Harrison Township, Economy, Ambridge, Wexford, Oakmont, New Brighton, Fox Chapel, Beaver, Tarentum, Calcutta and Baden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
